text: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
Praise be to Allah, Lord of the Worlds.
The Beneficent, the Merciful.
Master of the Day of Judgment.
Thee (alone) we worship; Thee (alone) we ask for help.
This is the Scripture whereof there is no doubt, a guidance unto those who ward off (evil).
Allah! There is no god save Him, the Living, the Eternal.
So remember Me, I will remember you.
And seek help in patience and prayer.
Allah burdeneth not a soul beyond its scope.
Say: He is Allah, the One!
Allah, the eternally Besought of all!
He begetteth not nor was begotten.
And there is none comparable unto Him.
Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
And He is with you wheresoever ye may be.
Verily in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
The mercy of Allah is near unto the good.
My mercy embraceth all things.
Lo! Allah is with those who keep their duty unto Him and those who do good.
And put thy trust in Allah, for Allah is sufficient as Trustee.
And Allah loveth those who are steadfast.
And whosoever putteth his trust in Allah, He will suffice him.
He it is Who created death and life.
Blessed is He in Whose hand is the Sovereignty.
And He is Able to do all things.
Have We not made the earth an expanse?
And the mountains as pegs?
And We have created you in pairs.
So which of the favors of your Lord will ye deny?
All that is therein passeth away.
There remaineth but the Countenance of thy Lord.
Read: In the name of thy Lord Who createth.
He taught man that which he knew not.
And be kind as Allah hath been kind to thee.
The life of this world is but comfort of illusion.
And your Lord is Forgiving, Full of Mercy.
Say: My Lord increaseth the provision for whom He will.
Allah is Gentle with His slaves.
And the Hereafter is better and more lasting.
He knoweth that which is before them and that which is behind them.
Lo! With hardship goeth ease.
Verily, with hardship goeth ease.
Serve Allah, and ascribe nothing as partner unto Him.
And walk not in the earth with pride.
He is the Forgiving, the Loving.
Allah calleth to the abode of peace.
And We made from water every living thing.
And He found thee wandering, and He guided thee.
So verily with the remembrance of Allah do hearts find rest.
The commandment of Allah is a decree determined.
And Allah is Best of Providers.
Allah is the Hearer, the Knower.
And Allah is Rich beyond need of the worlds.
And Allah is Ever Knower of all things.
Allah guideth whom He will unto a straight path.
And Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.
He giveth wisdom unto whom He will.
And Allah is Mighty, Wise.
Say: Nothing shall befall us save that which Allah hath decreed for us.
Allah hath power over all things.
Unto Allah belongeth the East and the West.
And He it is Who sendeth down rain.
And He is the Subtle, the Aware.
My prayer and my sacrifice and my living and my dying are for Allah.
There is no altering the words of Allah.
Allah increaseth in guidance those who walk aright.
And thy Lord is best aware of those who go astray.
And We made them leaders who guide by Our command.
We sent thee not save as a mercy for the peoples.
Allah is He besides Whom there is no other god.
He is the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible.
He is Allah, the Creator, the Shaper out of naught.
Unto Him belong the Most Beautiful Names.
All that is in the heavens and the earth glorifieth Him.
He knoweth that which entereth the earth and that which goeth forth from it.
And He is with you wherever ye may be.
Believe in Allah and His messenger.
And Allah is Seer of what ye do.
O mankind! Serve your Lord.
And Allah is the Best of judges.
And the servants of the Beneficent are those who walk upon the earth modestly.
And they who spend the night before their Lord, prostrate and standing.
And Allah is Full of kindness to His slaves.
He answereth the prayer of the suppliant when he calleth unto Him.
Call upon Me, I will answer you.
And despair not of the mercy of Allah.
Lo! Allah forgiveth all sins.
He it is Who accepteth repentance from His slaves.
And Allah loveth those who turn unto Him.
Surely Allah loveth those who rely on Him.
And the end is for those who keep their duty.
And Allah is sufficient as a Helper.
He is the First and the Last.
And He is the Inward and the Outward.
And unto Allah is the journeying.
And Allah is swift at reckoning.
And We created not the heavens and the earth in vain.
This is a Reminder unto those who ward off evil.
And Allah is the Best of Protectors.
He is the Knowing, the Wise.
And thy Lord doeth what He will.
And Allah is Aware of what ye do.
Establish worship, for worship preserveth from lewdness and iniquity.
And establish worship at the two ends of the day and in some watches of the night.
Guard strictly your prayers, and the middle prayer.
Successful indeed are the believers who are humble in their prayers.
Establish worship for My remembrance.
And bow down with those who bow.
Seek help through patience and prayer.
Call upon your Lord humbly and in secret.
And remember thy Lord within thyself humbly and with awe.
Establish worship from the decline of the sun until the darkness of night.
Lo! the recitation of the Qur’an at dawn is ever witnessed.
And in the night pray, an additional prayer for thee.
Those who forsake their beds to cry unto their Lord in fear and hope.
They were ever quick in rivalry for good works and cried unto Us in longing and in fear.
And your Lord saith: Call upon Me, I will answer you.
And establish worship and pay the poor-due.
And worship thy Lord until the inevitable cometh unto thee.
Give good tidings to the humble.
Those whose hearts fear when Allah is mentioned.
Successful indeed are the believers.
Who are attentive at their worship.
And remember Allah much, that ye may be successful.
Men whom neither merchandise nor sale beguile from remembrance of Allah.
So glorify Allah when ye enter the night and when ye enter the morning.
Unto Him be praise in the heavens and the earth.
And perform the prayer at the appointed hours.
Lo! prayer hath been enjoined upon the believers at stated times.
And remember the name of thy Lord at morn and evening.
And in the night, give glory unto Him.
Who rise at night beseeching their Lord.
And before the dawn they prayed for forgiveness.
Surely success is for the one who purifieth himself.
And remembereth the name of his Lord, so prayeth.
And glorify the praises of thy Lord before sunrise and before sunset.
And in the night-time glorify Him.
The mosques of Allah are only to be maintained by those who believe in Allah.
And establish worship and fear Allah.
Those who are constant at their prayer.
And who are watchful of their prayers.
Establish prayer and give zakah.
And establish prayer at both ends of the day.
And establish prayer and fear Him.
Those who establish prayer and spend.
And establish prayer and give zakah.
And establish prayer and obey the Messenger.
And establish prayer for My remembrance.
And establish prayer and give zakah.
Those who guard their prayers.
Those who are constant in prayer.
Those who humbly submit in prayer.
And bow with those who bow.
Guard strictly the prayers.
And be patient through prayer.
And seek help through prayer.
Indeed, prayer restrains wrongdoing.
Indeed, prayer is prescribed.
And establish prayer at its time.
They establish prayer and spend.
And establish prayer before Me.
Those who maintain their prayer.
And remember your Lord much.
And glorify Him morning and evening.
So worship Allah sincerely.
Call upon your Lord humbly.
And establish prayer in My house.
And remember Allah standing.
And remember Allah often.
And prostrate and draw near.
So glorify your Lord.
And worship your Lord.
And glorify Him at dawn.
And glorify Him before sunset.
Remember Allah with remembrance.
And call upon Him sincerely.
And remember your Lord within yourself.
So pray to your Lord.
And stand devoutly obedient.
And bow and prostrate.
And glorify Allah much.
And remember Allah during days.
And establish prayer at dawn.
Those who remember Allah standing.
And glorify Him in the evenings.
And glorify Him in the mornings.
Those who believe and pray.
And remember your Lord greatly.
So remember Me; I remember you.
And worship Allah alone.
And establish prayer regularly.
Those devoted to their prayer.
And prostrate to Allah.
And bow before Allah.
